Generation IV.Diamond: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
Generation IV.Pearl: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
Generation IV.Platinum: A comparison revealed that Bidoof 's front teeth grow at the same rate as Rattata 's.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It lives in groups by the water. It chews up boulders and trees around its nest with its incisors.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It lives in groups by the water. It chews up boulders and trees around its nest with its incisors.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
